long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your helper for Mp Bump handling

This extension is build for your help which will update your posts within each fifteen to sixteen minutes (15/16) which will eventually make your life easier and lot more productive. So it will leave you no tension of bump post regularly

Working Procedure:

When you install the extension successfully ,  You will see an extra element on your megapersonals web page which is the mark of activation of this extension. There you can find the posts numbers, current bump time and next bump arrival and two buttons such as reset and bump now button. You need to manually select all the posts on your page, to make sure your extension works properly, . Then you will see the post count is updated.

For removal of a post , just click the reset button and re add posts which you want to add for auto bump.

First of all , you need to subscribe using your ip address to get the full functionality of this extension. Please contact us and grab your subscription which will make your life easier.
